languages.text: "Как мы можем наблюдать, проктор Антар уничтожил еретический алтарь, а затем завязалась драка, в которой погиб псайкер. Не существует ни единого доказательства того, что Вольный Торговец действительно превозмог{mf||ла} колдовство. Вероятнее всего, пред нами стоит ерети{mf|к|чка} и сквернав{mf|ец|ица}".

"As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."
languages.original_text: "Как мы можем наблюдать, проктор Антар уничтожил еретический алтарь, а затем завязалась драка, в которой погиб псайкер. Не существует ни единого доказательства того, что Вольный Торговец действительно превозмог{mf||ла} колдовство. Вероятнее всего, пред нами стоит ерети{mf|к|чка} и сквернав{mf|ец|ица}".

There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

languages.text: "Wie wir alle sehen können, hat Proktor Anthar den ketzerischen Altar zerstört und den Psioniker im Kampf getötet. Es gibt keinen Beweis, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Zauber tatsächlich überwunden hat. Viel wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass die vor uns stehende Person {mf|ein Ketzer|eine Ketzerin} und durch und durch korrupt ist."
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Wie wir alle sehen können, hat Proktor Anthar den ketzerischen Altar zerstört und den Psioniker im Kampf getötet. Es gibt keinen Beweis, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} den Zauber tatsächlich überwunden hat. Viel wahrscheinlicher ist es, dass die vor uns stehende Person {mf|ein Ketzer|eine Ketzerin} und durch und durch korrupt ist."

languages.text: « Comme nous pouvons le constater, le proctor Anthar a détruit l'autel hérétique, après quoi un combat a éclaté au cours duquel le psyker a trouvé la mort. Il n'y a pas la moindre preuve que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se soit réellement {mf|affranchi|affranchie} de la sorcellerie. Tout porte plutôt à croire que la personne qui se tient devant nous est {mf|un|une} hérétique et une créature rongée par la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: « Comme nous pouvons le constater, le proctor Anthar a détruit l'autel hérétique, après quoi un combat a éclaté au cours duquel le psyker a trouvé la mort. Il n'y a pas la moindre preuve que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} se soit réellement {mf|affranchi|affranchie} de la sorcellerie. Tout porte plutôt à croire que la personne qui se tient devant nous est {mf|un|une} hérétique et une créature rongée par la corruption. »

languages.text: “正如我们所见，摧毁邪恶祭坛的人是安萨监察官。之后，安萨监察官与那位灵能者展开激战，将其当场格杀。没有一丝一毫证据能表明行商浪人真的战胜了邪恶的巫术。更有可能的情况是，站在我们面前的这个人就是个异端分子，是腐化的信徒。”
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: “正如我们所见，摧毁邪恶祭坛的人是安萨监察官。之后，安萨监察官与那位灵能者展开激战，将其当场格杀。没有一丝一毫证据能表明行商浪人真的战胜了邪恶的巫术。更有可能的情况是，站在我们面前的这个人就是个异端分子，是腐化的信徒。”

languages.text: «Como podemos observar, el Procurador Anthar destruyó el altar herético y, posteriormente, se produjo un enfrentamiento en el que el psíquico murió. No hay ni una sola prueba de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se sobrepusiera a la hechicería. Es más probable que la persona que vemos frente a nosotros sea un{mf||a} hereje y una criatura corrupta».
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: «Como podemos observar, el Procurador Anthar destruyó el altar herético y, posteriormente, se produjo un enfrentamiento en el que el psíquico murió. No hay ni una sola prueba de que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se sobrepusiera a la hechicería. Es más probable que la persona que vemos frente a nosotros sea un{mf||a} hereje y una criatura corrupta».

languages.text: 「ご覧の通り、アンサール代理人は異端の祭壇を破壊し、その後、異能者が死亡する戦闘が発生しました。ローグトレーダーが実際にその魔術を打ち破ったという証拠は一片たりとも存在しません。むしろ、目の前にいるこの者こそが異端者であり、堕落した存在である可能性のほうが高いのです」
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「ご覧の通り、アンサール代理人は異端の祭壇を破壊し、その後、異能者が死亡する戦闘が発生しました。ローグトレーダーが実際にその魔術を打ち破ったという証拠は一片たりとも存在しません。むしろ、目の前にいるこの者こそが異端者であり、堕落した存在である可能性のほうが高いのです」

languages.text: "Gördüğümüz gibi Üsteğmen Anthar, kâfir sunağını yok etmiş. Hemen ardından ruhsezerin ölümüyle sonuçlanan bir çatışma gerçekleşmiş. Hür Tacir'in büyü tesirinden kurtulmasına ilişkin bir delil kırıntısı dahi bulunmuyor. Huzurumuzda bulunan bu şahsın yozluk ürünü bir yaratık, bir kâfir olması kuvvetle muhtemeldir."
languages.original_text: "As we can observe, Proctor Anthar destroyed the heretical altar, and then a fight ensued in which the psyker died. There is not a single shred of evidence that the Rogue Trader actually overcame the sorcery. It is more likely that the person standing before us is a heretic and a creature of corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğümüz gibi Üsteğmen Anthar, kâfir sunağını yok etmiş. Hemen ardından ruhsezerin ölümüyle sonuçlanan bir çatışma gerçekleşmiş. Hür Tacir'in büyü tesirinden kurtulmasına ilişkin bir delil kırıntısı dahi bulunmuyor. Huzurumuzda bulunan bu kişinin yozluk ürünü bir yaratık, bir kâfir olması kuvvetle muhtemeldir."
